setup.title: Black Stars Rise—The Woods
setup.description: The woods have always had a spooky reputation – stories amongst the kids, probably due to those murders back in ’95. Still, it’s a park and you use it for normal park stuff – walking to work, exercise, taking the dog out. This morning, though, something strange is happening.

option.question: Where in the world are these woods? What's the town like?
What's Happening? (Answer some or all of these)

ul.li: Strange sounds can be heard in the woods. What are they like?
It's misty here this morning. What can be seen in the mist – a structure? A creature?
Animals are behaving unusually. What are they doing?
Something has been moved. What was it? Where did it go?
Strange carvings have appeared on trees. Draw some of them. What could have made them?
Something was crouched on top of a rocky outcrop, deep in the woods. What was it like?
Someone strange was watching the woods from outside the park boundary. What one thing makes them stand out?
Who in the park knows something about what's going on?
How are these things related to the murders in 1995?
What element of truth is hidden in the kids' stories about the woods?

option.question: Why Are They Involved? Ask these in any order you want, until each character has answered one.

ul.li: Who knows that there's something in the woods today, something that's calling them somehow?
Who was meeting someone here, but there's no sign of them?
Who brought one of the others here to check out [something weird]? (Tell the players one of the weird things you've decided on that they might be checking out).
Who needed to take a walk and chill out after an argument at home?
Who is visiting a place that was associated with the murders in 1995? What's your connection to them?
Who dreamed about [something weird] in the woods? (Tell the players one of the weird things you've decided on that they dreamed about).
